title: Mass Effect
notes:
Frame rate was stable with all graphics options turned up.

Requires builtin override for openal32 to fix sound.

1. Launch the game.
2. Close the game.
3. Run winecfg with your prefix set to <Library path>/compatdata/17460/pfx
3a. Example: "WINEPREFIX=/home/user/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/17460/pfx winecfg"
4. Add new override for "openal32".
5. Edit the override and select "builtin".

title: Mass Effect
notes: Needed to override sound in steamapps/common/Mass\ Effect/BioGame/Config/DefaultEngine.ini (disabling Hardware audio in settings wouldn't stick), 1080p option wasn't visible in in-game dropdown, but I could select it by scrolling down far enough with the mouse.

The game seems to run fine.

title: Mass Effect
notes:
No sound. Fix need to be added to game config file. How to fix no sound error. Go to stem/steamapps/common/Mass Effect/BioGame/Config/DefaultEngine.ini
Add lines to ISACTAudio.ISACTAudioDevice section:
DeviceName=Generic Software
UseEffectsProcessing=False

title: Mass Effect
notes: Needs quick fix for audio other than that runs perfect, Look here: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/177

title: Mass Effect
notes:
Good

The game refuses to allow me to disable software audio, every time I untick the box and restart the game it's ticked again.

To fix this I added the following under [ISACTAudio.ISACTAudioDevice] in BIOEngine.ini

DeviceName=Generic Software
UseEffectsProcessing=False
